questions.question: When is the hackathon?
questions.answer: The hackathon will take place from October 4th to October 11th.

questions.question: Hello
questions.answer: Hello, Good to have you here

questions.question: How can I register for the hackathon?
questions.answer: You can register by visiting the 'Register/Submit Idea' section on our website and filling out the registration form.

questions.question: What are the rules for the hackathon?
questions.answer: You can find the detailed rules and guidelines on our website.

questions.question: What is the theme of the hackathon?
questions.answer: ITAM and Hybrid FinOps, TI Platform, AI, Sustainability, Security, Quality, Cost Reduction, Customer Adoption, Sales Cycle, Customer Offboarding

questions.question: Who can participate in the hackathon?
questions.answer: The hackathon is open to Only flexera employees

questions.question: Are there any prizes for the winners?
questions.answer: Yes, we have exciting prizes including cash awards

questions.question: Can I participate as a solo participant?
questions.answer: Yes, you can participate individually or as part of a team.

questions.question: What is the maximum team size?
questions.answer: The maximum team size is 4-5 members.

questions.question: Will there be any workshops or talks?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a lineup of workshops by SME's on Databricks, AWS and Data/AI trainings

questions.question: What is the deadline for registration?
questions.answer: The registration deadline submit idea and register is august 25th.

questions.question: How can I submit my project idea?
questions.answer: You can submit your project through the 'Submission' portal on our website.

questions.question: Is there any participation fee?
questions.answer: No, participation is completely free.

questions.question: How can I contact the organizers?
questions.answer: You can reach out to Flexhack2024 (Teams channel)

questions.question: What is the judging criteria?
questions.answer: Projects will be judged based on innovation, impact, feasibility, presentation, automated optimizations, user-friendly dashboard.

questions.question: Can I use external APIs in my project?
questions.answer: Yes, you are allowed to use external APIs and libraries.

questions.question: Will there be any pre-hackathon events?
questions.answer: Yes, we have pre-hackathon webinars by SME's.

questions.question: What should I do if I face technical issues during the hackathon?
questions.answer: You can contact our technical support team at techsupport@hackathonwebsite.com.

questions.question: What is the main objective of FlexHack 2024?
questions.answer: The main objective is to leverage combined Flexera-Snow teams to drive more innovation and collaboration to grow ITAM and Hybrid FinOps, accelerate the TI platform, and explore new use cases in Sustainability and Security (CAASM).

questions.question: When is the FlexHack 2024 launching?
questions.answer: The FlexHack 2024 is scheduled to launch on August 5, 2024.

questions.question: What is the budget allocated for FlexHack 2024?
questions.answer: The budget allocated for FlexHack 2024 is $12,500 USD.

questions.question: Who can submit ideas for FlexHack 2024?
questions.answer: All Flexera & Snow Engineering and Product teams can submit ideas.

questions.question: When will the top 10-15 ideas be announced?
questions.answer: The top 10-15 ideas will be announced between 25th to 30th August.

questions.question: When will the winners be announced?
questions.answer: The winners will be announced in the last week of October 2024, possibly during the Engineering All Hands.

questions.question: What kind of team structure is expected for FlexHack 2024?
questions.answer: The typical team structure includes 1 PO/PM, 3-4 engineers, and 1 SME (shared resource, sponsored by ELT/PLT as needed).

questions.question: What trainings are planned for FlexHack 2024 participants?
questions.answer: Trainings will leverage Databricks and AWS and will include Data/AI training sessions in August and September 2024.

questions.question: When is the Readout to ELT/PLT scheduled?
questions.answer: The Readout to ELT/PLT is scheduled for 18th July.

questions.question: When will FlexHack be launched?
questions.answer: FlexHack will be launched on 5th August.

questions.question: What is the timeline for sourcing ideas for FlexHack?
questions.answer: Ideas will be sourced and approved by ELT/PLT from 5th August to 25th August.

questions.question: When will the ideas be finalized?
questions.answer: The finalization of the idea backlog (Top ~15) will occur between 25th August to 30th August.

questions.question: When will the challenges be announced and sign-ups take place?
questions.answer: The challenges will be announced, and sign-ups will take place from 2nd September to 6th September.

questions.question: What are the dates for the execution phase?
questions.answer: The challenge execution phase will occur from 4th October to 11th October.

questions.question: When will the demo presentations and evaluations take place?
questions.answer: The presentations and evaluations are scheduled for the week of 14th October.

questions.question: When will the top 5 teams present their demo to Brian?
questions.answer: The top 5 teams will present their demo to Brian in the week of 21st October.

questions.question: When will the winners of FlexHack be announced?
questions.answer: The winners will be announced in the week of 28th October.
